content: a warm thick hat to keep the winter breeze out while you enjoy your marshmallows by the fire adult large male sizing to fit 23 circumference head approximately 100 yards chunky/bulky weight 1 c t h p ampfire ales at attern  using the smaller needles cast on 84 stitches pm and join for working in the round be careful not to twist your stitches  work 1x1 rib knit one purl one around continue until you have about 2 of rib worked approximately 10 row  change to the larger needles and begin working chart 1 you will work the chart 6 times per row work the chart a total of 4 times 24 row  switch to the double pointed needles and shape the crown following the directions below note the sample hat used size 8/5 0 mm double points knitting loosely as that is what i own if i had size 10/6 0 mm i would have used them  break yarn leaving an 8 tail thread tail through the remaining stitches and pull tight to secure weave in the ends and enjoy your hat chart 1 work rounds 1-6 row 1
